      • initFromBools

        public static ModuleGraph initFromBools(boolean[][] moduleBools,
                                        boolean expanded)
        Factory method for Module Graph type.

        Initializes a module graph from a 2d boolean array

        Parameters:
        moduleBools - 2D boolean array of module locations
        expanded - If true, all modules are created expanded (i.e. unit size of 3x3.
        Returns:
        ModuleGraph object
